citation.article-title: Transfer of Methanogenium bourgense, Methanogenium marisnigri, Methanogenium olentangyi, and Methanogenium thermophilicum to the genus Methanoculleus gen. nov., emendation of Methanoculleus marisnigri and Methanogenium, and description of new strains of Methanoculleus bourgense and Methanoculleus marisnigri.

p.s: Description of Methanogenium thermophilicum comb. nov.

Methanogenium thermophilicum UCLA has 94% DNA sequence similarity with the type strain of this species, Methanogeniurn thermophilicum CR-1 (17). Because Methanogenium thermophilicum UCLA and Methanogenium olentangyi RC/ERT are phylogenetically closer to Methanoculleus bourgense MS2T than to Methanogenium cariaci JRIT, we propose the transfer of these two species to the genus Methanoculleus as Methanoculleus thermophilicus and Methanoculleus olentangyi, respectively.
